engagementTelemetry.description: Enables or disables the engagement telemetry for the current browser session.

openViewOnFocus.description: Enables or disables the open-view-on-focus mode for the current browser session.

functions.name: isBrowserShowingNotification
functions.description: Returns true if the browser is showing any kind of notification.

functions.name: isBrowserUpdateReadyToInstall
functions.description: Returns true if there is an update ready to install.

functions.name: lastBrowserUpdateDate
functions.description: Returns the date of the last browser update. If there's no update history, then the date the profile was first used is returned instead. The return value is milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC (i.e., suitable for passing to new Date()).

functions.name: openClearHistoryDialog
functions.description: Shows the 'Clear Recent History' dialog unless the user is in Private Browsing Mode.

functions.name: resetBrowser
functions.description: Opens a confirmation dialogue asking if the user wants to reset their profile.
